answers.answer: That isn't normal. When you press on your skin does it leave an indent for a few seconds?
no it doesn't...i think im gonna call my doctor
it's good if it doesn't. sounds like normal swelling to me in the legs. rest and elevate your legs. the face is a little outside the norm though not unheard of. a call sounds like a good idea
If your face is swelling it could be preeclampsia. Have you been having headaches?

question: Im swollen all over.Im only 27 wks  its worse when I wake up. My face , around my eyes, my nose,  hands , ankles and feet are so swollen. When I wake up it looks like someone puched me in the face smh....is this normal?
title: too much swelling ?
